attributes.comment:
I strongly oppose this increase as it would put so many burdens on people
wanting to settle in the USA. This proposed increase looks like a punishment for
any law abiding person who wants to settle in the USA!!! If indeed an increase is
needed... it would make more sense to be around the normal inflation not 80%. If
an extra funding is still needed... USCIS should seek it from the federal
government not from the poor new settlers who have so many costs to take care
of.

I also oppose some of the re-structuring proposed. Having I-485 include both
Advanced Parole and Work Authorization would mean unneeded extra costs for
people already with a valid work visa. What about dependants? What is work
Authorization good for a 10 years old kid!!

Please please re-consider your proposal ... the increase for I-485 would mean a
huge burden for even a small family of 4 people. The new cost would be $3620
that is an increase of $2320 .. is that really reasonable?

Thanks for listening...
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
